sense.gloss: to jump, to leap, to prance, to spring up, to bound, to hop
to break up, to close, to come to an end
to hit (e.g. to have a car hit something or someone)

sdata.j: ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓が|↑跳↑↓は↓ねる|のをごらん。
トムは↑庭↑↓にわ↓にしゃがんで、カエルが|↑跳↑↓は↓ねる|のをずっと↑見↑↓み↓ていた。
sdata.e: Tom was staring at the frogs that were hopping around in the garden.
